name: bnj1459
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1)
-| wb(w2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
-| wi(w2, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| wb(w2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
-| wi(w2, w1)

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
